item.title: Last Days at Yanqi Lake Campus
item.author: contact@kayak4665664.com (kayak4665664)
item.description: We moved from Yanqi Lake Campus to the city of Beijing on July 12. Here are some photos I took in the last few days at Yanqi Lake Campus.

item.title: Go to Panjiayuan to Get Glasses
item.author: contact@kayak4665664.com (kayak4665664)
item.description: My current glasses were bought before I went to college, and I can’t see clearly anymore. I am in Beijing, and I heard that Panjiayuan (Beijing Glasses City) had very cheap glasses, so I went there.

item.title: First Semester at UCAS
item.author: contact@kayak4665664.com (kayak4665664)
item.description: The first semester at UCAS passed quickly, and I feel that the experience of this semester is very rich.

item.title: I Got My Drivers Licenseüöò
item.author: contact@kayak4665664.com (kayak4665664)
item.description: After more than half a month of training, I successfully got my driving license! Thanks to each of my coaches for their patient guidance!

item.title: August 18, a New Beginning
item.author: contact@kayak4665664.com (kayak4665664)
item.description: Since the end of the graduation project, I have been looking forward to the letter of admission every day, and it is finally here!

item.title: Next Week I Will Have My Graduation Project Defense
item.author: contact@kayak4665664.com (kayak4665664)
item.description: The graduation project is finally coming to an end, and the final defense will be held on the afternoon of June 9!

item.title: Made a Cake Againüç∞
item.author: contact@kayak4665664.com (kayak4665664)
item.description: The flour may be less, it’s not as good as last time. Not bad.

item.title: Pingyao Ancient City
item.author: contact@kayak4665664.com (kayak4665664)
item.description: A few days ago, I went to Pingyao Ancient City. The entire ancient city preserves the original appearance of the Ming and Qing Dynasties. It’s very spectacular to gaze into the distance from the city wall. There are many snacks, my favorite is Pingyao beef and wantuo!

item.author: contact@kayak4665664.com (kayak4665664)
item.description: I went out for a walk today and took some photos. The blue sky! Fantastic!

item.title: Google Has Indexed My Website
item.author: contact@kayak4665664.com (kayak4665664)
item.description: Google has indexed my website! At present, I have also submitted the sitemap to Baidu and Bing, waiting to be indexed.

item.title: Graduation Project Starts Now
item.author: contact@kayak4665664.com (kayak4665664)
item.description: This week my school started the work on the graduation project, and now I have determined the topic and officially started my graduation project.
